name: brave-new-oarc
title: Brave New OARC Scenario
author: JustGoFly + Oarcinae + canidae
description:
This mod provides a scenario that overhauls multiplayer spawning for Brave New World.
[color=red][font=default-bold]You can play Brave New World and OARC separately, this mod merges both of those scenarios for an awesome single player / multiplayer game![/font][/color]
 Read the FAQ if you are having troubles with how to get started in this scenario.
